thread.section_title: Experthelp.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Experthelp.com | www.experthelp.com
thread.title: Hazel Quilter

author: Hazel Quilter
title: Hazel Quilter
text: I was charged x 3 times on my card for this service , which did not fix my pc anyway, I was charged $67,00 then another $24,00 then another $20,00 and I was only expecting the $67.00 and the tip of $15,00 which I gave thinking the problem was fixed when it was not. I would not use this service again, and just hope no more funds are taken out of my account.
